name: vanilla-api
description: A starter api for node using sequelize

scripts.dropdev: psql -c 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS vanilla_dev' && psql -c 'CREATE DATABASE vanilla_dev'
scripts.reset: npm run dropdev && sequelize db:migrate && sequelize db:seed:all && npm run dev
scripts.droptest: psql -c 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS vanilla_test' && psql -c 'CREATE DATABASE vanilla_test'
scripts.resettest: npm run droptest && ./node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:migrate --env test && ./node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:seed:all --env test
scripts.test:run: export NODE_ENV=test && sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && sequelize db:migrate && sequelize db:seed:all && ./node_modules/.bin/mocha -R spec 'tests/**/**.test.js' --exit

author: Ezra Keddell
